[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_color_gradient_stops=”#000000 0%|rgba(255,255,255,0) 99%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://s-thermal.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/hero-products.jpg” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Durable, Customizable Furnaces and ovens from SierraThermal

All process parameters, including temperatures, flows, and exhaust levels, are fully programmable for recipe design flexibility and precision. Our furnaces are designed to accommodate the most dynamic thermal processes and are customizable to meet your specific processing requirements.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.19.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blog_extras post_order=”ASC” include_categories=”8″ blog_layout=”block_extended” show_more=”off” show_author=”off” show_date=”off” show_categories=”off” show_comments=”off” _builder_version=”4.21.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_blog_extras][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered: Durable, Customizable Furnaces and ovens from SierraThermal All process parameters, including temperatures, flows, and exhaust levels, are fully programmable for recipe design flexibility and precision. Our furnaces are designed to accommodate the most dynamic thermal processes and are customizable to meet your specific processing requirements.
